alert.note: Alert for La Salle; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 7:44PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern La Salle and north central Webb Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 744 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Las Tiendas, or 12 miles southwest of Encinal, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Encinal. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 30 and 41. US Highway 83 between mile markers 676 and 690. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Texas.
